1)  Honestly I'm not sure.  I'm sure Tom would gladly accept money for it though, should he find this post.
2)  I believe the Beyond Freedom project was dropped as a result of Tom (and Pete?) getting employed with Blizzard.  Though with OpenGlad being alive and well we never know, it could possibly eventually get revamped to higher resolution graphics and such.
 Amir Touray <z0diac717@...> wrote:1)Can I still buy Glad?
The site hasn't been updated in years and I don't want
to send money to a collapsed company, no matter how
good the Glad demo was.

2)Is Glad: BF coming up ever? or is that just a dream?
